page.title: 16LOCAL NEWS AND CHANGES
page.content:
{"Hutton village School Closure"} The picturesque Hutton Village School is to close despite an eighteen month fight by parents and staff to save it - there has been a school on this site since 1840. A statement from the action group to save the school told the village feeling this week (22nd May 1985) " After we had lived here for eighteen months with the threat of closure we were never prepared for the sadness that we experienced when we knew for certain on May 9th that Hutton School would be closed" stated Libby Read.
